ygData.subject: Re: Bards and Mob Hate
ygData.msgSnippet: Well Ive yet to see things as bad as you guys have it, but Its definitly a problem for me. I was in crushes tower the other day behind 4 or 5 people, just
ygData.messageBody:
Well Ive yet to see things as bad as you guys have it, but Its definitly a
problem for me. I was in crushes tower the other day behind 4 or 5 people,
just resting after a hard fought battle with Crush himself. All of a sudden
Dvinn spawns and runs right at me. 4 or 5 swipes of his dirk and im
finished. I am getting angry and upset that mobs wont even stop to hit the
people hitting them until the "mighty" Bard is dead.

Baian bard of the 18th song.
Fennin ro

-----Original Message-----
From: John Kim <kim@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 6:34 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bards and Mob Hate


>From: John Kim <kim@...>
>
>Might I remind everyone that there's a theory that high
>charisma makes you more hated by monsters. Aside from bards,
>enchanters tend to have high charisma.
>
>On Wed, 7 Jul 1999, Jones, Brian wrote:
>>
>> If it happened in the room where there is a secret entrance to the mine,
the
>> same thing happened to our party (they targeted our enchanter though).
>
>> > From: Brendan <brendan@...>
>> >
>> > > I was only affecting my group - these things came from out of
NOWHERE -
>> > why
>> > > would this act like such a magnet?
>> >
>> > even worse, i was down in runnyeye over the weekend standing around
>> > in a room waiting for some tougher monsters to spawn. I wasn't singing
any
>> > songs, and goblins that weren't in the same room would detect me and
i'd
>> > hear the "Half-elves like you have no place in our room". about 3 or 4
>> > minutes later a horde of about 8 goblins would burst into the room and
go
>> > ape-shit on me.
>> >
>> > It's pretty unfair that goblins that couldn't see me would come after
me
>> > when i wasn't doing anything to them, especially since it wasn't
happening
>> > to anyone else in the room.
>> >
>> > -klamot, bard of fennin ro
>> >
>> >

Sponsor ----------------------------
